message: Let's split fairly, more for me!
My turn to propose a more reasonable split. Let's get this done.
This is my final offer - let's be sensible and wrap this up.
You're running out of time, Bob!
Okay, Alice, let's be fair. A 50/50 split is the most logical solution. Take it or leave it.
Your 50/50 split was too late, now it's my turn to be greedy!
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. Let's end this now.  I'm taking a hit with this offer, but it's better than both of us losing everything.
